official_title: A bill to amend the Deep Seabed Hard Mineral Resources Act, as amended, to authorize appropriations to carry out the provisions of the Act for fiscal years 1990 through 1994.

summary.text: Amends the Deep Seabed Hard Mineral Resources Act to authorize appropriations to carry out that Act for FY 1990 through 1994.
